runs.comm: starts off with a length ball outside off, Gambhir takes a couple of paces down the track as he pushes it towards cover
Gambhir walks across the stumps and punches it to point, no run again
Gambhir tries to get his first run with a big heave over long-on, gets a bottom edge onto his pads, and the batsmen scamper through for a single, that ball swung in a touch
Shot! that's amazing, first ball in an international match in the tour for Sehwag, it's short and he pulls it over deep backward square leg for six, typical Sehwag
another six from Sehwag, it's a short boundary square on the side, it's a touch short again and Sehwag crashes it over midwicket, he picked that up from middle and leg
wow, what a start from Sehwag, yet another six, this time to square leg, hardly any effort behind that shot as he launched that off his pads
overpitched outside off, Gambhir pokes it towards point
yorker length from O'Brien, Gambhir tries to make room to work the ball but he can only squeeze it towards extra cover
not a six this time, short of a length, a bit of width, Sehwag thrashes it to the fielder at point
tries to flay it over long-on this time, doesn't get hold of it, and the ball rolls towards mid-on for a single
Gambhir gets into the act now, does a trademark shimmy down the track, moving towards the ball, carves it square for a boundary

Gambhir's gone, middle stump's on the ground, a bit short again from O'Brien, Gambhir was looking to clobber him over midwicket, the ball doesn't bounce as much as he expects and it hits the top of middle
first ball is a touch overpitched outside off, Sehwag punches it to cover

massive massive six, Sehwag doesn't really care who the bowler is, it's overpitched, Sehwag doesn't bother with footwork, he launches it high over the long-off boundary, that's way back into the crowd
goes for a big swipe over midwicket, doesn't connect with the ball this time
superb ball from Butler, a yorker just outside off, even Sehwag in his murderous mood can't do much about that, he inside edges it towards short fine leg
played with soft hands towards short midwicket, Sehwag wanted a single but Rain a screams "No, no, no"
good looking shot from Raina, slightly wide and Raina carves it towards cover, no run though

Sehwag's gone, O'Brien's on a hat-trick now, big wicket for New Zealand, Sehwag eyes the short square boundary at midwicket again, misses the ball and it crashes into legstump, O'Brien is over the moon and why not
good ball, short of a length, on middle and leg, Rohit doesn't connect as he looks to work it to the off, batsmen hare through for a leg bye
superb over so far from O'Brien, a yorker on middle and leg, Raina just about dig it out
oh dear, Raina gets his first runs with the biggest six of the game so far, Raina clears his front leg and absolutely smashes that over midwicket
great comeback from O'Brien, yorker on legstump, Raina squeezes it towards point
back of a length on off this time, Rohit gets on the backfoot and taps it towards the bowler, no run
length ball outside off, pokes towards point by Raina for a single
stifled appeal for lbw from the bowler, that was pitching outside leg, the ball trickles towards the offside and the batsmen scamper a single
length ball on off, Rohit mistimes his drive towards extra cover, he's yet to get off the mark
goes for a booming drive, doesn't make contact and it goes through to the keeper
gets his first run with a punch to mid-off, Vettori return hits Southee rather painfully on the knee
terrible delivery to end the over, high full toss outside off, Raina clubs that over point for a six, it had been a superb over till then
Rohit gets his first six, a nonchalant flick off his pads, that brings up India's fifty, this really is a tiny ground

Rohit's gone, tries to play across the line, gets a leading edge which balloons in the air, Brendon McCullum calls for the catch, he has plenty of time to position himself to take a comfortable catch near gully
Raina pushes the ball to point
back of a length on off, played with soft hands towards cover, Raina shouts "No" early
overpitched on middle, Raina pushes it towards mid-off for a single
on the pads, Yuvraj nudges it to square leg for a single
starts off a bit wide outside off, Yuvraj tries to steer it to third man, misses the ball
Yuvraj's gone! another big blow, New Zealand have the edge now, a quicker arm ball from Vettori, Yuvraj goes for the sweep, misses and is rapped in front on middle
pushes it to the offside for a single
punched down to long-off for a single by Raina
another arm ball from Vettori, defended off the backfoot to short extra cover by Dhoni
big shout for lbw from Vettori as Dhoni is struck by a full ball on his toes, but Dhoni managed to get some bat on that
carved to deep square leg by Raina, Oram's there at the boundary to cut it off
angling into the pads, Dhoni tries to whip it to midwicket, doesn't make contact with the ball
turned to square leg by Dhoni, a single to him
overpitched on middle and off, Raina pushes it to long-off, a bit too firmly to come back for a second

Dhoni's bowled! India are in trouble here, a hint of inward movement from a back of a length ball, Dhoni jumped and tried to defend but that kept lower than he expected and his offstump is rocked back
overpitched on the pads, Yusuf nudges it to short fine leg to get off the mark
that was close, vociferous appeal for lbw from Vettori, that pitched on a length and hit him low in front of middle, umpire may have had doubts whether there was some bat involved as Yusuf defended
cut away to point, straight to the fielder
powerfully swatted to wide long-on, only a single for a lot of effort
flighted by Vettori, pushed back to the bowler by Raina
down the leg side and that's a wide
slightly tossed up by Vettori, outside off, Raina eyes light up and he goes a big swipe over midwicket, doesn't connect with the ball
jabbed towards extra cover by Raina
poor start from Nathan, full toss on the pads, Yusuf swats that square leg for a six, not much effort behind that shot
Yusuf's giving a warm welcome for Nathan, clobbers that over wide long-on for a six this time
three in a  row for Yusuf, he didn't quite get hold of it, slightly top-edged, goes high but long enough to clear the long-on boundary

Yusuf's goes, Jacob Oram does a repeat of Adam Voges' fantastic catch to get rid off Brendon McCullum in Sydney, it was wide outside off and fullish, Yusuf powered that to long-on, it rocketed towards the boundary but Oram manages to catch it just inside the boundary rope, he was going to go across, so he tossed the ball in the air, came back into the field of play, steadied himself and completed the ctach
turned to short midwicket  by Irfan, no run
Irfan pushes it to long-off for a single
poked towards point by Irfan
angling into the pads, Raina works it behind square for a single
watchfully pushes a length ball towards cover
on the pads, easily worked to square leg for a single
Vettori slides it too much down the legside and that's a wide
wonderful over from Vettori, ends it with a length ball on middle, Raina goes on the backfoot and drives it towards extra cover
starts off with a slower yorker on legstump, Irfan just about manages to dig it out
another single, this time to point, Raina is given width and he helps himself
length ball on offstump, well-timed drive towards wide long-off
low full toss outside off, Raina powers that to long-off
slower offcutter from O'Brien, surprises Irfan, the batsman was looking to cut the ball but that was too close to the body to be attempting that
yet another single to end the over, Irfan drives an overpitched ball to mid-off
Irfan continues in the same vein as his brother, he charges down the track and lofts Nathan down the ground for only the second four of the innings
appeal for lbw, but Irfan had inside edged that onto his pads
Raina plays it with soft hands towards point, Brendon McCullum has to run across to field
Nathan's firing it in, flat and fast, punched back past the bowler this time
Raina shuffles down the track to punch the ball to long-on, the single brings up India's 100
starts off with a length ball on off, pushed towards extra cover
full toss on offstump, flailed towards cover for a single

that's the end of Irfan, soft dismissal, Irfan opened the face of the bat to run it down to third man, gets too much off the ball and it flies at a nice, catchable height to Nathan McCullum at backward point
Harbhajan's early on the shot, that was a length ball on middle and off, Harbhajan checks his drive and it trickles towards mid-off
defended back to the bowler this time
Harbhajan gets underway by working a middle-stump delivery behind square on the leg side
overpitched on legstump, Harbhajan nudges it towards midwicket
stunning shot from Raina, he loves that midwicket area and he got under that ball from Vettori and send it into the crowd
worked to deep square leg
tried to paddle-sweep, gets a thick inside-edge onto his pad and teh ball rolls towards short midwicket
uses his feet and drives it to long-off for a single
poor delivery but Raina doesn't capitalise, short and down the legside, Raina helps it on its way to backward square leg
powerfully driven down the ground by Raina, Neil Broom does well to come across and cut it off at the long-on boundary
pitched up, on the pads, Raina swings it to midwicket
full and straight, Harbhajan walks across his stumps and pushes it to mid-on
slower delivery from Ryder, Harbhajn was surprised by that, checks his drive to mid-on
goes for a big swipe, inside edge takes the ball past the keeper
driven forcefully towards midwicket, so forcefully that he has to really steam through to complete the single
full toss outside off, Raina thrashes it towards deep cover
good yorker outside off, Harbhajan does well to run it down to third man
another yorker from Butler, chopped to point by Raina, chance of a run-out at the keeper's end but the throw is wide
another full ball, Harbhajan swats it to midwicket, the batsmen get a couple
Harbhajan tries to give himself room, Butler follows him and sends down a superb yorker, Harbhajan somehow gets that away towards point
Butler has been very accurate this over so far but this was too wide outside off
french cut from Raina, it was overpitched and just outside off, Raina went for the booming drive, gets a thick inside edge and it races past the keeper for a welcome boundary for India
Southee takes a leaf out of the Butler handbook, he also keeps it full on middle and off, Harbhajan swipes it to midwicket
similar ball again, Harbhajan manages to get his placement better this time, Oram has to make good ground to cut it  off at the midwicket boundary
yorker on middle this time, Harbhajan gets an inside edge to short fine leg
overpitched on off, Raina leans across to work it towards midwicket
full and down the legside, following Harbhajan who was making room, doesn't make contact with the ball though
Southee ends a great over with an overpitched ball on offstump, Harbhajan backs away and carves it to cover
full toss on middle and leg, Harbhajan swipes it to midwicket, but the placement is poor, straight to the fielder and that'll only be a single
superb shot from Raina, it was a low full toss from O'Brien, Raina stays on the backfoot to get under it and launch it over long-off
Raina brings up his half-century with another six, this was a length ball, Raina mishit it, getting it to go too high, just clear the straight boundary by a yard or so
wide and full, Raina looks to cut, gets a bottom edge back to the bowler
stunning timing from Raina to bring up the 150, very full and at least a foot outside off, Raina was backing away, he just opened the face of the bat to steer it square of the man at the third man
good yorker to finish, Raina squeezes it to the on side for a single and retain strike
full toss, Raina mishits it down the ground, it bounces a couple of times before going to the fielder at long-off
Harbhajan does a trademark swing to the legside, gets it to deep backward square
good ball that, full and angling into the batsman, Raina can only push it to long-off
smart work from Harbhajan, he walks across the stumps and paddles it fine, fine enough to beat the short fine leg and run away for four
this was much shorter from Southee, Harbhajan thrashes that past midwicket to get himself consecutive boundaries
bowled him, Harbhajan tries a cute paddle again but he's undone by an on-target yorker from Southee, middle stump is left lying on the ground
